sections.adresOstatniegoMiejsca: Address of last residence/stay in Poland

fields.jest_poszkodowanym: Is the notifier the injured person?
fields.opis_okolicznosci: Detailed description of circumstances, place and causes
fields.ewidencja: Is machine in fixed assets register?
fields.dokumenty_karta_wypadku: Documents confirming right to accident card

hints.nazwa_panstwa: Provide if address is other than Polish
hints.nazwa_panstwa_twoj: Provide if your address is other than Polish
hints.numer_telefonu: Providing this info will facilitate contact. Optional field.
hints.adres_ostatniego_miejsca: Provide last residence in Poland if currently abroad but lived in Poland before. If no residence address, provide stay address or last residence in Poland
hints.adres_do_korespondencji: If you choose: – poste restante, provide only postal code and city name of the facility, – PO Box, provide box number in Building no., facility postal code and city name.
hints.adres_dzialalnosci: Provide if injured person runs non-agricultural business or cooperates in one
hints.adres_opieki: Provide if injured person works as a nanny on activation contract
hints.dane_osoby_zawiadamiajacej: Fill if you are a different person than the injured
hints.dokument_tozsamosci_brak_pesel: Provide if you don't have a PESEL
hints.adres_zamieszkania_zawiadamiajacej: Fill if you are a different person than the injured
hints.adres_ostatniego_miejsca_zawiadamiajacej: Fill if you are different from injured. Provide last residence in Poland if currently abroad...
hints.adres_do_korespondencji_zawiadamiajacej: Fill if different person and correspondence address is different from residence/last residence/stay
